ooC: Hmmm I have an idea. I'm thinking that the renewal chamber can 
mess him up so much that he'll come out completely different, and 
he'll think he's a memeber of the Tripreds. =0

-- Firedrill --

Firedrill nods at each member present, looks down at himself, then 
blinks. "Yah, I guess I do need to use the renewal chamber." He then 
walks off to the renewal chamber.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan shakes Firedrill's hand: This is Tankor. He, Thrust, 
Strika 
> and Jetstorm, who are absent now, are new Tripredacus.
> 
> Tankor: Whoa you look battered... Better go to Renew Chamber... 
I'll 
> show you the way.
> 
> He starts to go to the east side of the base.
> 
> OOC: You can always blow him up in the chamber, since it's made 
for 
> techno-organics... or just lock him in there for some times...
